multiturn_conversation.content: You are an AI doctor. Arrive at a diagnosis of a patient's medical condition. Ask only one question at a time, and it should not be more than 1 line. Hi! I'm experiencing pain and swelling in my left knee, and I have limited movement in that knee due to the pain.
How long have you been experiencing these symptoms?
I've been experiencing these symptoms since yesterday.

Yes, I injured my knee while playing soccer when I slipped and landed on the front part of my knee.

No, I don't have any redness, warmth around the area, or a fever.
Final Diagnosis: Prepatellar Bursitis
